name: Mariami Gachechiladze
content: overview – Quantum Computing (QC) – TU Darmstadt Quantum Computing Group The quantum computing group at TU Darmstadt is a newly formed group that works at the intersection of foundations of quantum physics and quantum information processing. Under the Research tab, you can find more information about our focus. If you have any questions or comments, please do not hesitate to contact us. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- We are always on the lookout for excellent doctoral and postdoctoral candidates. Please get in touch if you have questions. Contact Go to top Contact Prof. Dr. Mariami Gachechiladze Picture: Bal, Patrick mariami.gachechiladze[at]tu-... work 06151 -16 20846 Work S4|14 2.1.12 Mornewegstraße 30 64293 Darmstadt We would like to customise the information and usability of this website to your preferences and needs. To this end, we use so-called cookies. Please choose which cookies you would like to enable when visiting our webpages. Some of these cookies are required to load and correctly display this website on your device. These are strictly necessary or essential cookies and cannot be deselected. The preferences cookie saves your language setting, while the statistics cookie regulates how the open-source statistical software “Matomo” analyses your visits to and activities on our website. For more information about cookies we use, please refer to our privacy policy. Strictly necessary only Preferences Statistics Accept all Save & close Legal note
